work.name: Alacer Systems and Technology P Ltd
work.projectDescription: Velocity FinCrime suite is a comprehensive application for regulatory bodies to combat against financial crimes like AML (Anti-Money Laundering), Terror Financing etc. The suite currently addresses the requirements of USA, India, Bangladesh, and Australia.
work.technologyStack: ASP.NET 4.5, C#, Web API, Azure DevOps (Configuration Management, Build and Release Pipelines)
rolesAndResponsibilities: 1) Alacer India was the pilot initiative of Alacer Group (USA). Hence pioneered to help them setup the IT infrastructure and development environment at WeWork facilities in Bengaluru with the starting team of 6 development members and 1 UI designer. 2) Comprehensive CI/CD pipelines right from developer check-in to their own VM in Azure Cloud both for application and database development 3) Architected the Fedwire Parsing module for the suite.4) Streamlined the cross-cutting strategies of the application after the first draft of the application was handed over to Alacer by outgoing vendor from Far-East.
